game.name: Paradise Beyond the Nightmare
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Paradise Beyond the Nightmare" is a 2D exploration horror game where you explore and solve puzzles in a 2D space with depth. You can experience moving both sideways and forwards through eerie paintings.
